metadata.dc:author: Stuyt, M T
Revilla Borjas, C
metadata.dc:description: The paper deals with the cases of 3 women, aged between 28 and 35 years, the three having had tonsillectomy and complaining of troubles compatible with the styloid syndrome. X-ray and tomographs corroborate the diagnosis. Under general anesthesia the abnormally developed processes were high resected and the complaints gone.
metadata.dc:title: Sindrome estiloideo. A prop√≥sito de 3 casos.
[The styloid syndrome. Apropos 3 cases].
